author: neilg
msg: in response to at least two bug reports, adopt a change of implementation from SAX 2.0.1.  Now it should be possible to create attributes lists with 0 elements.  Note that this has no effect on the behaviour of this class (except it will not throw ArrayIndexOutOfBounds exceptions) and neither does it affect signature compatibility.

author: neilg
msg: finally:  some documents on grammar caching.

author: sandygao
msg: Fixing bug [9974]: typo of the name of the boolean type.
